title: Looks like Kayle's getting a slight redesign

replies.body: Really hoping they go in the direction of Kyrin’s edit with the leotard transformed into more of a long tabard.
Here's hoping for an actual breastplate like what Samus has and not sternum-crushing boob plate...
Looks like it's just a pipe dream. August said they're only adjusting her textures/splash -- this means no physical changes or additions to the 3D model.

Texture can do ALOT.
https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-4KwUfz4Vh-g/W376C8NjT1I/AAAAAAABGQw/58LnAaYO1Bg5pcIgToT_p2haxPJBQNQ0QCLcBGAs/s1600/braum5.jpg

######afaik these should just be texture swaps unless chromas suddenly got model changes.

They can, but Reav3 already stated on Reddit that they're only adjusting the white parts of her armor. They aren't going to cover up her purple skintight suit or anything of that sort, which was the main qualm we all had in the first place.

Essentially, our feedback has fallen on very stubborn (and to be fair, time-crunched) ears.

That would be interesting.

It's just when I looked videos up on the subject the ) shape around the breasts was mentioned as incredibly important as to deflect blades away from the sternum, with extra layers of armour being more-and-more important in order to absorb the impact of the blade.

The O O shape of boob plate lends itself to not only drawing the blade to the sternum, but also in minimizing the amount of material in-between that vital area and the blunt force of a blade against the metal.

look i used to hate boob armor too, but after watching this video there's not really a reason to hate it anymore. It makes sense and it still works. So we gotta spread the knowledge so people stop hating on Boob plate, cause there isn't a reason to.
I can't repeat this to everyone who is hating this design a lot, but I don't like pointless design as much as the next person, especially if it was a pointlessly sexy design (Glaring at you Kai'sa, they WILL rework her is some way cause a lot of things about her are inconsistent). But I am really not seeing sexuality being a focus with this Kayle design  that everyone is stuck on. The design is MUCH more focused on just how much POWER this angel radiates. I think a lot of people have just become really sensitive to this topic due to riots past missteps, like Kai'sa's near complete failure of a design, i think that was a catalyst that is really coloring people's judgments right now.

I think that Kayle's case speaks for herself, almost genderless Samus-esque design at first, rework's armour is so 'clingy' as for people to see it as a bodysuit w/ a potential 'belly button' on it.  A l lot of female designs do make sense once you realise that a lot of Riot was ran by the worse stereotypes of frat boys and were potentially discriminating against their female staff.

[Here's another one.](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=jZJGvLF8tEU)

Opposite view, might want to skip a bit.
Professional armourer, but he made an error about "only 2 historical examples of female armour" so who knows.

Then again, Shad compared the access to the waist to vital organs consistently flanked by the arms (depending on the stance) in more traditional armor to the boob armour's access to sensitive and vital areas of the human body such as the breasts and sternum.  Metal is hard, but it will occasionally bend and need repairs.  Best to make any problems posed in those rare situations as comfortable and minimal as possible.

Definitely agree w/ you.

As for effectiveness of it all, between denting and whatnot I'd be iffy, but hard to say for sure.  Could be a shield/cushion/deflection effect rather than a 'magnet' one and be more useful (would think there'd be more domes on male armour in that case rather than the case being [rare, and a bit flat when done](https://cdn.vox-cdn.com/thumbor/OVR-LJaKk7SikGvGbCivM-ofpvU=/0x0:3000x2000/1200x0/filters:focal(0x0:3000x2000):no_upscale()/cdn.vox-cdn.com/uploads/chorus_asset/file/3933644/cuirass.jpg)), but would need a Mythbusters episode to confirm, and would still hate the aesthetic of it (not as unsightly as the male equivalent though).

edit: i just wana say thanks for being reasonable! Its really refreshing,

if you read the comments there are several people explaining how no... its still impractical. Joost1120 and ZanlanTheGreen make excelent points.

Even in the video he says "the detriments are not nullified completely" "even if this design is slightly less effective" and I just think hes understating how less effective it would be... 

theres really no reason to go for boop armor over a simple domed armor except for aesthetics, because its more expensive and it would take longer to make! 

Also, lets be real, game designers dont care if its practical or not, the only reason this is done is to be sexual, it is entirely possible to do titty armor in a way that ISN'T sexual but thats not whats happening in league

[also here is a article from an armorer on this topic](https://kotaku.com/the-problem-with-womens-armor-according-to-a-man-who-m-5868925)

domed armor is just more practical from a time standpoint, a money standpoint, a protectiveness standpoint.

so do I want to remove all boobplate from league? no actually I don't, I want to have options for everyone, I want to have my preferred armor which is more practical domed plate and then there can be other skins that let people have boobplate if thats what they like, everyone should have options.

Metal is still metal, unlike in Hollywood it doesn't matter if a sword hits you right in the sternum since it's not gonna cut through solid metal. With swords you're aiming for armpits or elbows anyway since that's the only part you can damage. The concussive part doesn't matter since you are wearing layers of cloth underneath.
The only "negative" with boob plate is if you're against someone with a weapon that actually can damage a sheet of metal, like a hammer or a mace, but then it doesn't matter anyway since a non-boob plate will cave in just as easily.
The only reason there's no boob plate armour in real life is simply because women didn't go to war.

you can admit that you prefer boob plate on armor, thats fine, just dont pretend that its actually good for combat.
